column5: at this time of year what should i target in the river while staying in sarnia? what seems to be working right now? ill be fishing from downtown up to the mouth....
I posted the SAME EXACT question too! hahaha  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=34960  I'll be fishing from SHORE though; that might be the only difference.
ill be fishing from shore as well
When are you heading to Sarnia? I may be heading this weekend... Leaving Friday I think.
hmmm...i guess nobody fishes that river?  ill be there monday to friday. look for a tall almost bald guy with a shorter native guy

Yeah, doesn't look like we have anybody that does....  Monday? like... Tomorrow Monday? (Aug.10)? I'm going to be heading there Friday (Aug.14) till Sunday (Aug.16).  EDIT: The only thing I know about the area... under the "Blue Water Bridge"... there's a particular spot that the locals go to and fish for Walleye w/ Power Grubs - Hope that helps.
never fished the area myself but there was a writeup in OOD in the spring with some locations along the river  http://www.ontariooutofdoors.com/Fishing/w...D=87&a=read
